org.apache.paimon.flink.action.cdc.format

Interface DataFormat

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractDataFormat, AbstractJsonDataFormat, CanalDataFormat, DebeziumAvroDataFormat, DebeziumJsonDataFormat, JsonDataFormat, MaxwellDataFormat, OggDataFormat

    public interface DataFormat
    Supports the message queue's data format and provides definitions for the message queue's record deserialization class and parsing class AbstractRecordParser.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.apache.flink.streaming.connectors.kafka.KafkaDeserializationSchema<CdcSourceRecord> createKafkaDeserializer(org.apache.flink.configuration.Configuration cdcSourceConfig) 
      AbstractRecordParser createParser(TypeMapping typeMapping, List<ComputedColumn> computedColumns)
      Creates a new instance of AbstractRecordParser for this data format with the specified configurations.
      org.apache.flink.api.common.serialization.DeserializationSchema<CdcSourceRecord> createPulsarDeserializer(org.apache.flink.configuration.Configuration cdcSourceConfig) 

    • Method Detail

      • createParser

        AbstractRecordParser createParser(TypeMapping typeMapping,
                                  List<ComputedColumn> computedColumns)
        Creates a new instance of AbstractRecordParser for this data format with the specified configurations.
        Parameters:
        computedColumns - List of computed columns to be considered by the parser.
        Returns:
        A new instance of AbstractRecordParser.
